name: Marnie’s Grimmsnarl ex
author: PLANETA Mochizuki

abilities.name: Punk Up
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 5 Basic {D} Energy cards and attach them to your Marnie’s Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Shadow Bullet
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
